bug.author: graciousgrey
bug.summary: For alerts the default timeout from vuetify is used instead of the configured one
bug.description:
For the v-snackbar element no timeout is set, this causes the element to use the default timeout from vuetify instead of the ones set in the addMessage() function. The alert.css is not in use
Acceptance Criteria:
Set the timeout attribute of the v-snackbar element to 0 Remove the alert.css
